Requirement_Description: Emergency exit shall open in <3 seconds (powered mode)
Emergency exit shall open in <8 seconds (manual mode)
Opening force shall not exceed 50 lbf
Manual system shall be independent of electrical power
Door shall withstand cabin pressure differential
Dual locking mechanisms required
Slide shall deploy automatically when door opens
Slide shall inflate in <6 seconds
Slide shall support dual-lane evacuation
Armed indicator shall be visible to crew
Door position shall be indicated in cockpit
System shall provide manual slide deployment backup
Girt bar shall attach automatically
Slide shall withstand 30kt wind
Emergency lighting shall operate on battery backup
Handle shall be RED with clear markings
No single failure shall prevent emergency opening
Inadvertent opening probability <1E-9 per FH
System shall operate -65°C to +85°C
System shall withstand lightning strike
Control software shall meet DO-178C Level A
Mechanical components shall be fail-safe
Spring assist shall aid manual opening
Hinges shall support 150% ultimate load
Seals shall maintain pressure to 8000ft cabin altitude
Door shall be operable from inside and outside
Visual and tactile feedback required for handle operation
Slide lanes shall be independently inflatable
System shall include self-test capability
Arming system shall prevent ground slide deployment
Pressure locks shall engage above 12000ft cabin pressure
Evacuation capacity shall exceed 70 pax/min
Slide shall function as life raft in ditching
Emergency exit dimensions shall meet Type A requirements
Structure shall withstand bird strike
All fasteners shall have locking features
NDT inspection required for critical structure
Photoluminescent marking required
Handle force shall be testable without door opening
CAOS interface shall monitor door health
Slide pressure monitoring required
Power actuator shall have speed limiting
Manual cables shall be dual-redundant
Sensors shall be voting redundant
System shall withstand crash loads
All materials shall be fire-resistant
Slide deployment shall not injure passengers
Door shall remain secure in turbulence
Indicators shall be redundant
System shall record usage and faults
